title: SAXON Cancels 2025 Summer Shows As Vocalist BIFF BYFORD Needs An Emergency Procedure
description: Here's hoping everything is alright. The post SAXON Cancels 2025 Summer Shows As Vocalist BIFF BYFORD Needs An Emergency Procedure appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: Saxon has sadly cancelled their upcoming 2025 summer shows as singer Biff Byford undergoes an emergency procedure. It's worth noting that Saxon's Rockharz Festival in Ballenstedt in Germany on July 2 performance is still on, but other than that – cancelled. No additional information is currently available, though we wish Byford all the best with his health. "Saxon were so looking forward to performing at all the below summer festivals and events, but the health and well-being of the band obviously has to come first," wrote a spokesperson for Saxon's management company. "It goes without saying that all in Saxon are gutted that they will be unable to perform but look forward to hopefully being back on stage in time to play both Trutnoff Open Air Festival in Czech Republic on August 23 and Neuborn Open Air on August 29. The band are also very much looking forward to their upcoming tours of both Spain, France and the U.K. later this year too. Saxon will still be performing as planned at Rockharz Festival in Ballenstedt in Germany on July 2." 7/12 Leoben, Austria Area 53 Festival7/24 Ekilstuna, Sweden Lokomotivat7/25 Borgholm, Sweden Öland Rock Festival7/26 Linköping, Sweden Garden7/27 Gävle, Sweden Furuvik7/29 Oberhausen, Germany Turbinenhalle 27/31 Czaplinek, Poland Pol'And'Rock Festival8/1 Wacken, Germany Wacken Open Air8/9 Ekenäs, Finland E Town Rock8/16 Dinkelsbühl, Germany Summer Breeze Festival Want More Metal? "It goes without saying that all in Saxon are gutted that they will be unable to perform but look forward to hopefully being back on stage in time to play both Trutnoff Open Air Festival in Czech Republic on August 23 and Neuborn Open Air on August 29.
